blog.content:
Nmap (Network Mapper) l√† m·ªôt trong nh·ªØng c√¥ng c·ª• quan tr·ªçng nh·∫•t trong lƒ©nh v·ª±c b·∫£o m·∫≠t m·∫°ng. ƒê√¢y l√† c√¥ng c·ª• m√£ ngu·ªìn m·ªü ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng ƒë·ªÉ kh√°m ph√° m·∫°ng v√† ki·ªÉm tra b·∫£o m·∫≠t.

**C√†i ƒë·∫∑t Nmap:**

- **Windows**: T·∫£i t·ª´ https://nmap.org/download.html
- **Linux**: `sudo apt-get install nmap` (Ubuntu/Debian) ho·∫∑c `sudo yum install nmap` (CentOS/RHEL)
- **macOS**: `brew install nmap`

**C√°c l·ªánh Nmap c∆° b·∫£n:**

1. **Qu√©t c∆° b·∫£n**: `nmap 192.168.1.1`
   - Qu√©t 1000 port ph·ªï bi·∫øn nh·∫•t tr√™n target

2. **Qu√©t to√†n b·ªô subnet**: `nmap 192.168.1.0/24`
   - Qu√©t t·∫•t c·∫£ IP trong d·∫£i m·∫°ng

3. **Qu√©t t·∫•t c·∫£ port**: `nmap -p- 192.168.1.1`
   - Qu√©t t·∫•t c·∫£ 65535 port

4. **Qu√©t port c·ª• th·ªÉ**: `nmap -p 80,443,22 192.168.1.1`
   - Qu√©t c√°c port ƒë∆∞·ª£c ch·ªâ ƒë·ªãnh

5. **Ph√°t hi·ªán OS**: `nmap -O 192.168.1.1`
   - X√°c ƒë·ªãnh h·ªá ƒëi·ªÅu h√†nh ƒëang ch·∫°y

6. **Ph√°t hi·ªán d·ªãch v·ª• v√† version**: `nmap -sV 192.168.1.1`
   - X√°c ƒë·ªãnh d·ªãch v·ª• v√† phi√™n b·∫£n ƒëang ch·∫°y

**C√°c k·ªπ thu·∫≠t qu√©t n√¢ng cao:**

- **SYN Scan** (Stealth): `nmap -sS target`
- **TCP Connect Scan**: `nmap -sT target`
- **UDP Scan**: `nmap -sU target`
- **Script Scan**: `nmap --script vuln target`

**NSE Scripts h·ªØu √≠ch:**

- `--script smb-vuln-*`: Ki·ªÉm tra l·ªó h·ªïng SMB
- `--script http-enum`: Li·ªát k√™ th∆∞ m·ª•c web

**V√≠ d·ª• th·ª±c t·∫ø:**

```bash

nmap -sS -sV -O -A --script vuln 192.168.1.100

# Qu√©t nhanh subnet ƒë·ªÉ t√¨m host s·ªëng
```

**L∆∞u √Ω quan tr·ªçng:**
- Ch·ªâ qu√©t m·∫°ng b·∫°n c√≥ quy·ªÅn

Nmap l√† c√¥ng c·ª• m·∫°nh m·∫Ω nh∆∞ng c·∫ßn s·ª≠ d·ª•ng c√≥ tr√°ch nhi·ªám v√† tu√¢n th·ªß ph√°p lu·∫≠t.

Burp Suite l√† platform h√†ng ƒë·∫ßu ƒë·ªÉ test b·∫£o m·∫≠t ·ª©ng d·ª•ng web, ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng b·ªüi h·∫ßu h·∫øt c√°c penetration tester v√† security researcher.

**C√†i ƒë·∫∑t v√† Setup:**

**C√°c th√†nh ph·∫ßn ch√≠nh:**

**1. Proxy Tool:**

**2. Target Tool:**

**3. Spider Tool:**

**4. Scanner Tool (Professional):**

**Workflow c∆° b·∫£n:**

**XSS (Cross-Site Scripting):**
